message: Using the '.*' form of import should be avoided - javax.ws.rs.core.Response.Status.*.
Using the '.*' form of import should be avoided - org.gluu.casa.plugins.authnmethod.rs.status.SecondFactorUserData.StatusCode.*.
'}' at column 9 should be on the same line as the next part of a multi-block statement (one that directly contains multiple blocks: if/else-if/else, do/while or try/catch/finally).
